reviews.sentence: The lady preparing the breakfast was great and she was very pleasant even when she was overwhelmed. My family went to the pool and my wife enjoyed the room and visit. You guys did a good job thank you.
Comfortable 1 night stay. Very comfortable stay. Good breakfast very close to carmax and gas station friendly staff. Hallway needs to be remodeled.

Couples Birthday Getaway. I was especially fond of the breakfast area. The lady working the dining area was very helpful. I usually make a mess fixing my waffle but she helped me do it all the way to the end. The front desk clerk was also great. Clean room plenty of privacy and great food. What more could we ask for loved it.

Came into town for the Clemson Game. This place is about 37 minutes away but conveniently off I85 Alot of stores and restaurants nearby. It appears to have recently changed names so the current sign is hard to see. The hotel is pushed back off the road so it is easy to miss. It looks like it was recently renovated and looks real nice. Front staff was very nice and helpful. Breakfast was fulfiling. Rooms where decent size with big bathrooms everything in working order. I was happy and you can not beat the price.
It was pleasant and a good value. Breakfast selection was good. Very nice staff and were helpful. Elevator needed adjustment. Its door did not always want to open readily.

Overview of one night stay. I would stay again because it is budget friendly and clean. A bit disappointed in what I would say is unprofessional service but it was OK. As I entered to check in I passed two persons one smoking and was not acknowledge. No one was at the check in desk. Just moments later the two persons I passed came in and the one who worked there went around desk while keeping conversation with the other person. As I waited for conversation to end and to be check in the employee finally acknowledged me and checked me in and was nice enough during the process. This seems to be the way of the staff because next morning for breakfast the hot items were depleted. When I approached the two employees chatting at front desk and asked for hot breakfast items they agreed to get them and the host mentioned that they run through the hot items as if guests were eating to much. But I got some breakfast and checked out. Everything else was just fine. Room was clean. Shower was good. Linens clean and fresh. Refrigerator needed a defrost. Microwave worked. Coffee well it was alright. nothing to brag about. Funny enough the toilet sounded like a bunch of witches melting aliens as if it was possessed when it was flushed and filling. Grocery store restaurants fast food available a block away. The motel is situated behind vacant dealer parking lots nothing fanciful no landscape. Nice size pool not open and work out room.

Cleanliness. The staff was friendly. The room was definitely not as clean as I would imagine. The bathroom door was dirty. There was hair that was not mine on the floor in the bathroom. The walls were dirty. I was like people splashed things on the wall and no one took the time to wipe down the walls. For the price of the hotel it can definitely use a good clean down in the rooms. I think the price is too much for what you get. The breakfast was hot and decent. I just think the rooms should be cleaner. That was not my first time staying at that hotel and I can say that my last visit was so much better.

great great value. Our room was clean and in fantastic shape smoking King room. it did not stink or have burn holes. the cable TV had all the channels I get at home and was a nice updated flat panel. cofemaker fridge and microwave in room. comfy bed. good pillows. nice hot shower great water pressure. wifi worked fine even for netflix. elevators worked well. breakfast includes sausage patties and eggs. and yogurt and all the other normal breakfast items. coffee was always fresh and ready. hotel is a little tricky to exit but is close enough to shopping fuel liquor and food. will definitely stay again if in greenville.

Reasonable accommodations at a good price. This hotel was a good deal at 56 night and provided adequate accommodations. The room was pretty clean and included a fridge and microwave. The location is right off the highway exit giving good access to whatever you came to town for. The hotel driveway off the road is a little confusing and the first time we ended up pulling into the vacant car dealership next door be sure te pull in right next to the sign. The breakfast was functional and as expected cereal waffles yogurt fruit juice etc. Overall nothing that particularly stands out good or bad besides a good deal on price. Good price Very close and accessible from highway. Elevator and hallways smelled like smoke room was fine though.
Outstanding Value. Rodeway was an excellent value. Service was great along with the hot breakfast. The only negatives. Loose fixtures in the bathroom and the phone went dead on the last day.

Pleasant. it is definitely not the worst place I have stayed. The bed was atrocious though. I think the mattress was broken in some way because the middle sunk way down and you literally had to crawl over the very firm sides that stuck up. It was almost impossible to get comfortable and sleep on it. The ac in the room worked amazingly well. The room was clean albeit very old and musty. I was slightly concerned with the what appeared to be mold on the ceiling above the bed and in the shower but convinced myself it would not be an issue for one night. The major pitfall of the room is that the rooms all have adjoining doors. I thought hotels had done away with those. Apparently not. So we could hear all of the noisy people on the other side and smell the smoke of their room even tho ours was a non smoking room. The toilet was not well installed it wobbled front to back when sat on. Water pressure was good in the shower but the tub did not drain well so you end up standing in a few inches of water during your shower. Breakfast was decent tho it would have been really lovely to have some fresh fruit included. The lady who runs the breakfast bar sat out at a table in the room with us and conducted lots of very loud personal phone calls which was very disruptive to our simple breakfast. All told if you need to stop while road tripping this place is not that bad for a stop over provided you could find it cheap. I would not pay more than the 70 including tax that we paid for it. But it is definitely not one that I would recommend for a vacation stay.
Closed breakfast before 10 AM. that is a NoVo.
Great stay. Very friendly and helpful staff. Breakfast was delicious and had to wash a uniform and machine was n’t working they cleaned the uniform and made a mom very happy.

Needed a hotel for the night to stop at on our way home that would be convenient comfortable and and breakfast. This hotel delivered. The room was very clean and comfortable. Would definitely stay at this property again.

GREAT. It was nice that breakfast was offered. Breakfast selection needs to be changed each day the eggs that were suppose to be. with cheese were dried out. Stick to scramble. Eating the same thing each day not appealing.

Exceptional. It was a very good place to stay. Room was clean and comfortable serviced by the housekeeping staff daily. Breakfast was adequate and well supplied. Breakfast staff was exceptional assisting my daughter with the waffle maker. No complaints at all. Having to leave to go home.
Good. Linda in breakfast room was an exemplary employee. Broken items in room tv did not work desk chair had broken leg phone did not work refrigerator too 2 days to get cold.

Good. Stayed here for a wedding party. The room was comfy and a nice size. The breakfast was subpar but filled the hole. The sheets were clean but there was a red bleached stain on one side. This kind of turned me off.

Very Good. Great location right off hwy 85 at Laurens Rd. Convenient to get in and out. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The king bed was really comfortable and there were plenty of pillows. The breakfast could have had more options. The potatoes had bacon in it so not suitable for vegetarians. Could have had more fresh fruit and not fruit in juice. Ran out of coffee too. Towels had stains.

This is newly renovated but they have some absurd rule where they do not accept reservations to people within a 30 mile radius. I asked to speak to a manager and was able to sway her to allowing me and my girlfriend to stay but beware if your local. Other than that the property was aesthetically pleasing being it was new paint and fixtures. Breakfast was just ok and is hard to find because it is nestled behind a car dealership off the motor mile right before you reach Laurens Rd and Hwy 85not the best area but since it is hidden it was ok.

Very nice hotel at a reasonable price. Very up to date nice hotel. Breakfast was good rooms were very clean and beds comfortable. We found the front desk staff to be very courteous and helpful. Nice exercise room. Just a really good stay in Greenville. There are really no restaurants that you can walk to from this location.
